articles.title: Housing Levy increase to 3% draws worker pushback
articles.description: Housing Levy increase to 3% draws worker pushback. Housing Levy Increase continues to dominate Kenyan policy discourse as stakeholders weigh in on the implications for ordinary citizens.
articles.content: Housing Levy increase to 3% draws worker pushback. The Housing Levy Increase has been a subject of intense debate across Kenya. Analysts say the policy will have significant implications for the housing sector. Various stakeholders including civil society groups, business associations, and county governments have expressed diverse opinions on the matter.
